title: School of Illusion

feature_defs.trigger: when you cast an illusion spell
effects: you can cast it without verbal components
if the spell has a range of 10 ft or more, its range increases by 60 ft
Minor Illusion is enhanced per subclass text
notes: Minor Illusion improvements include expanded usage and bonus-action casting; keep exact Minor Illusion tweaks in feature notes if needed by your engine.

effects: Summon Beast and Summon Fey are always prepared for you
you can cast each of those spells once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest
creatures summoned by those free casts have half their normal hit points
limits: one free cast per spell per long rest
half hit points applies only to the free-cast versions

feature_defs.trigger: when you are hit by an attack
effects: you can cause the attack to miss you instead
limits: once per short or long rest
notes: You can also restore this feature by expending a spell slot of level 2 or higher (no action).

feature_defs.trigger: on your turn while an illusion spell of level 1 or higher that you cast is ongoing
effects: choose one inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of the illusion and make it real for 1 minute
limits: object must be no larger than a 5-foot cube
object can’t deal damage or otherwise directly harm a creature
object can’t grant a condition to a creature

notes: Illusory Reality is a bonus action while an eligible illusion persists and the real object lasts 1 minute.
Illusory Self recharge can be restored by expending a level 2+ slot without an action.
